Query.Sentence: SELECT COUNT(b.bk_id) as "plazasOcupadas" FROM ${mainschema}.booking b join ${mainschema}.booking_date bd on b.bk_id=bd.bk_id #WHERE#

WITH temp_table AS( SELECT booking.bk_id, booking.bk_usr_id, booking.bk_cw_id, booking.bk_state, coworking.cw_name, booking_rate.bkr_ratio, ARRAY_AGG (date ORDER BY date ASC) AS dates FROM ${mainschema}.booking JOIN ${mainschema}.booking_date ON booking.bk_id = booking_date.bk_id JOIN ${mainschema}.coworking ON booking.bk_cw_id = coworking.cw_id LEFT JOIN ${mainschema}.booking_rate ON booking.bk_id = booking_rate.id_bkr GROUP BY booking.bk_id, coworking.cw_name , booking_rate.bkr_ratio ORDER BY dates DESC) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM temp_table #WHERE#
SELECT count(bd.bk_id) as "dates" FROM {mainschema}.booking b join {mainschema}.booking_date bd on b.bk_id = bd.bk_id #WHERE#

SELECT c.cw_name as cw_name, b.bk_id as bk_id, b.bk_state as bk_state FROM ${mainschema}.coworking c JOIN ${mainschema}.booking b on c.cw_id = b.bk_cw_id JOIN ${mainschema}.booking_date bd on b.bk_id = bd.bk_id WHERE b.bk_state = true and bd.date >= current_date #WHERE_CONCAT#

SELECT count(bd.bk_id) as "bookings", c.cw_capacity, bd.date FROM ${mainschema}.coworking c JOIN ${mainschema}.booking b on c.cw_id = b.bk_cw_id JOIN ${mainschema}.booking_date bd on b.bk_id = bd.bk_id WHERE b.bk_state = true #WHERE_CONCAT# group by c.cw_capacity, bd.date

SELECT cw.cw_capacity, bd.date, COALESCE(COUNT(DISTINCT b.bk_id), 0) AS plazasOcupadas FROM coworking cw LEFT JOIN booking b ON cw.cw_id = b.bk_cw_id LEFT JOIN booking_date bd ON b.bk_id = bd.bk_id #WHERE# GROUP BY cw.cw_capacity, bd.date ORDER BY bd.date
